
```{r}
timetable <- function(object) {
  class(object) <- "list"
  for(i in names(object)) {
    object[[i]] <- as.data.frame(
      tidyr::separate_wider_delim(
        dplyr::select(
          dplyr::mutate(
            dplyr::rename(
              object[[i]], 
              p.value = i),
            p.value = signif(10 ^ -p.value, 4)),
          -strain),
        datatraits,
        delim = ": ",
        names = c("dataset", "trait")))
  }
  dplyr::as_tibble(
    dplyr::bind_rows(
      object))
}
```

```{r}
timetable(traitSum)
```

```{r}
dplyr::bind_rows(traitSum, .id = "traitname")
```
